name: spark
description: Spark is a fast and general cluster computing system for Big Data
preInstallNotes:
Note that the service is beta and there may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation or other discrepancies.
We recommend a minimum of two nodes with at least 2 CPU and 2GB of RAM available for the Spark Service and running a Spark job.
Also the Spark client might take up to a few minutes to download
postInstallNotes:
Spark DCOS Service has been successfully installed!

	Documentation: https://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/running-on-mesos.html
	Issues: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/SPARK
postUninstallNotes:
The Apache Spark DCOS Service has been uninstalled and will no longer run.
Please follow the instructions at http://beta-docs.mesosphere.com/services/spark/#uninstall to clean up any persisted state.
